articles.content:

articles.author: Steve Almasy and Jabari Jackson, CNN
articles.title: SEC will allow athletes back to campus in June - CNN
articles.description: The SEC will allow voluntary in-person athletic activities to resume on campuses beginning June 8, the college sports organization said Friday.
